text: Proton: There's a member of the ElementalOffense Squad at a village we'll be passingby.
Proton: It will be important that we haveenough power to stop any evil which may beat The Nation of Altar.
???: So, you guys are heading to Altar?
???: I just finished a mission in Quad soI'll be able to help you if you need it.
???: Alright then, I'll be headingback to Static.
Proton: We're almost at Altar, but there's somebandits up ahead.
